Actions.Text:
#!/bin/bash

FOLDER_PATH="$KMVAR_local_Folder"

if [ -d "$FOLDER_PATH" ]; then
    if [ -w "$FOLDER_PATH" ]; then
        echo 0
    else
        echo -2
    fi
else
    echo -1
fi

ThenActions.Text: ### Requires Keyboard Maestro 8.0.3+ ###set kmInst to system attribute "KMINSTANCE"tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine"	set kmCopyAsMarkdownLinkUUID to getvariable "local_CopyAsMarkdownLinkUUID" instance kmInstend tell-- Copy as Markdown linktell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine"	do script kmCopyAsMarkdownLinkUUIDend tell
